free: #e I was thinking to call you. Where did those children go?
#c 我本來要打電話給你的. 那些小孩子去哪裡了？
#c 他自己在部落四處晃晃。
#e He is well. He has a car. He has a camera.
#e The other is not. He could only squat here.
#c 另一個就不是了，他只能縮在這裡。
#e He is writing on the Seediq language.
#e Hasn’t he gone to look for it?
#e I myself have many places to go, too.
#c 我自己也有很多地方要去。
#e “Go to my house. There are people at home,” I told him.
#c 「去我家找，我家有人。」我對他說。
#e He is doing something with the computer. He plays the computer all day in the tribe.
#c 他在搞電腦。他整天在部落玩電腦。
#e He seems to be doing that but says it does not work.
#c 他好像在做那個又說不好。
#e His time was all spent on that. How can it be like that?
#c 他的時間都花在那裡，那怎麼可以呢？
#e Is it that its sound does not come out?
#c 是不是他的聲音沒出來？
#e Are there ones that are inserted into the ears?
#c 不是有喇叭嗎？那個他的什麼...
#e It seems his speaker is out of order.
#c 好像是他的喇叭壞掉了。
#e He has a car and a camera.
#e He got up so early in the yesterday morning.
#e I went to Nantou yesterday to attend wedding.
#c 我昨天去南投參加結婚。
#e Isn’t a child of Iyung Nawi getting married today?
#c 今天不是Iyung Nawi的小孩也結婚嗎？
#e Yesterday, it was a brother/sister of Zhang Minghua.
#c 昨天是張明華的弟弟/妹妹。
#e When I came back, it was over eleven o’clock. I ran into the beard, who was at the other side on the cliff.
#c 我回來的時候，超過十一點，遇到鬍鬚，他在對面懸崖那裡。
#e He was taking pictures of our Hngali.
#e So he took pictures of our Hngali plain?
#c 他就面對著我們的Hngali平原拍照？
#e Yes, he went there and took pictures of our farmland in Hngali.
#c 對，他去那裡拍我們Hngali的耕地。
#e I think how good it is for him to go wherever he wants.
#c 我想他怎麼那麼好，可以去想去的地方。
#e Is he alone? did the woman come?
#c 只有他一個人嗎？那個女的有來嗎？
#e He said, “I will be back later.”
#e He said to me, “I’m going back on Sunday.”
#c 他原本就跟我說：「我星期天要回去。」
#e Which one? That Southern Min guy?
#c 哪一位？ 是那個閩南人嗎？
#e What about the beard? Is he leaving, too?
#c 那個鬍鬚怎麼樣，也要走嗎？
#e How about that matter of going China? Have you decided to go yet?
#c 要去大陸的事怎麼樣了？你決定要去了嗎？

ori: 兩萬要要要匯過去了啦.\
free: #c 那就這一兩天可能兩萬要匯過去了啦。

ori: ...好我明天行程我想去看一下

free: #e Didn’t he send to you? He sent the letter to me.
#c 他沒寄給你嗎？他寄信給我了。
#e He didn’t send it to me. Where did they send to?
#c 他沒寄給我。他寄到哪裡去了？
#e Maybe he sent to the farmers’ association.
#e I will go there to see it.
#e Are you coming to Hori later?
#n naqah wa這裡是「不巧」的意思。
#e Unfortunately, I will not be free. I’m going to join in watching people fighting for money in Taichung.
#c 不巧我沒空，我要去台中湊熱鬧看搶錢。
#e It’s fine. When you have time, let’s go see once.
#c 很好。你有時間的時候，我們去看一次。

gloss: 去-受焦.非現實=2SG.主格=1SG.屬格
free: #e No matter what, I will take to see how Southern Min people fight for money.
#c 不管怎樣，我帶你去看看台灣人怎麼搶錢。
#e Who is the person who passed away and who you will go to see in Xinyi?
#c 你們要去信義鄉看的那個過世的人是誰？
#e That chairman. Maybe he drank wine and bumped.
#c 那個理事啦。可能他喝酒撞車。
#e So I told you I have not transferred it yet.
#c 所以我才跟你說我還沒有匯。
#e Do you want me to transfer together?

ori: ...不要不要不要，你那裡有那個帳
gloss: ...不要不要不要，你那裡有那個帳

free: #e Perhaps I wrote down the account.
#c 我可能有把帳號記下來喔。
#e Maybe... I don’t know where that letter is.
#c 可能...我不曉得那個信在哪裡了。

ori: 電話，電話號碼我都沒有了，明天早上

free: #e If you are not there, put it on your desk.
#c 如果你不在的話，就放在你的桌子。
#e I’ll be here because tomorrow I’m going to teach a retake course.
#c 我會在，因為明天要去教重修課。

ori: 我是我說我們二十一嗎

free: #e When do Tumun and others come back?
#n de-前綴家在人名前，表示「...他們」。
#e It might be their phone call three o’clock yesterday midnight, twice.
#c 昨天晚上可能是他們打來的電話，兩次。
#e They are in France. Then they are going to pass the Netherlands and go to Germany.
#c 他們在法國，然後會經過荷蘭，到德國。
#e I forgot. I thought it was...
#e Are you not coming back to the tribe?
#e No, I’m afraid of drinking. It’s bad.
#e If I sometimes drink one or two cups. They make me drink...
#c 如果我有時候喝一兩杯，他們讓我喝的話...

ori: 不是不舒服我心裡有壓力

free: #e I myself will regret why we drank.
#c 我自己又很後悔，我們為什麼要喝。

ori: 我什麼都不參加，我乾脆就這樣啦

free: #e Takun, weren’t we talking about Xie Minnan getting a bad illness?
#c Takun，不是說謝敏男生不好的病？
#e I heard that is a bad illness.
#e It seems that he won't last long.
#n 不確定k<m>heti的「隨便」是哪一個意思。
#e Who knows? I saw him there get out of a car once.
#c 誰知道呢？我有一次看到他在那裡下車。
#e Isn’t he already as thin as I?
#c 不是也跟我一樣那麼瘦了嗎？
#e He even doesn’t have the strength to walk.
#c 他連走路的力量都沒有。
#e That man used to be very strong.
#c 那個人以前身體非常強健。
#e So he does not look good.
#e He used to be very strong, but now seems to be very thin.
#c 他本來很強健，現在好像很瘦。

ori: 對啊那個差很多，那個就是有問題啊。

free: #e He said, “If you are coming, I’ll ride in your car.” I’ll bring him over tomorrow.
#c 他說：「你來的話，我要搭你的車。」那明天我會帶他去。
#e Bring him over tomorrow morning. Then I’ll accompany him.
#c 明天早上帶他來好了，然後我可以陪他。
#e If you come in the morning, send him at that time.
#c 你早上來的話，那個時候送去。
#e No, it does not matter. Tell him to look for people in the morning, so there are people to talk with.
#c 不是啦，沒關係啦。叫他早上先去找，才有人對話。
#n 這裡解釋成「我也不曉得」。
#e I talked with my mother, and he seems...
#c 他跟我媽媽互相講話，好像...
#c 不是啦，他那個好像壞掉。
#e He intended to buy it in Puli.
#e Who will bring this? “I have this in Taipei,” he said.
#c 誰要帶這個？他說：「台北有我這個東西」。
#e He once had me hear that in Taipei.
#c 在台北曾經用那個給我聽。
#e Don’t forget this document. Pass by here. I’ll be expecting you.
#c 不要忘記那個文件。你明天從這裡經過，我會等你。
#e You know to pass...so you know how to transfer money.
#c 你知道經過...你才知道怎麼寄錢。
